title: [Minecraft.net|MINECRAFT BUILDS]A Place of Adventure 冒险之地
author: qsefthuopq
txt_content:
文章日期2020-03-19作者Jess Robinson
译者qsefthuopq

原文链接点击打开
A Place of Adventure
冒险之地
Created by PiffleKnob
由PiffleKnob打造



“Welcome to Galendor” is an adventure map made by PiffleKnob that you could easily get lost in. Why? Because they’ve put in almost four years of work into their creation. The variety of buildings and custom landscaping make this a place you could spend hours exploring. And what are those structures in the water? Perhaps we can find a boat to investigate!
“Welcome to Galendor” 是一张由PiffleKnob制作的冒险地图，你很容易迷失其中。要问为什么？因为他在这张地图里投入了几乎4年的心血。各种各样的建筑和自定义的景观使得你可以在这片冒险之地上探索好几个小时。那些水下的建筑是什么？也许我们可以找艘船去调查一下！

其它MINECRAFT BUILDS并没有显示在分类里，目前可以在COMMUNITY页面看到

replies.txt_content: 淦 这篇好短(但没有我Nova的短)
